Current students sought advice from alumni regarding career paths and navigating challenges. Many alumni emphasized the importance of networking and building relationships while still in school. They suggested actively seeking out mentors and attending industry events. Several shared experiences with imposter syndrome and offered strategies for overcoming self-doubt, encouraging students to focus on their progress and celebrate small wins. 

Alumni highlighted the value of internships and gaining practical experience, stressing that these opportunities significantly boosted their resumes. They advised students to explore different fields and be open to unexpected career paths. Several alumni discussed the importance of developing soft skills like communication and teamwork. Many also underscored the significance of resilience and perseverance in overcoming setbacks. Students were encouraged to prioritize their well-being and maintain a healthy work-life balance.
